item.title: Kenshi Abe (阿部 拳之)
item.description: About Me Welcome to my web page! My name is Kenshi Abe and I am a research scientist at CyberAgent, Inc., AI Lab. I am interested in reinforcement learning, imperfect-information games, and multi-agent learning. Research Interests Reinforcement Learning Multi-agent Reinforcement Learning Partially Observable Markov Decision Problems Imperfect Information Games E-mail abekenshi1224[at]gmail.com SNS Github Twitter LinkedIn Blog and Presentation Qiita Research Blog SlideShare

Research International Conference Yuki Shimano, Kenshi Abe, Atsushi Iwasaki and Kazunori Ohkawara: “Computing Strategies of American Football via Counterfactual Regret Minimization”, AAAI 2022 Workshop on Reinforcement Learning in Games (Oral Presentation), 2022. Kenshi Abe, Yusuke Kaneko: “Off-Policy Exploitability-Evaluation in Two-Player Zero-Sum Markov Games”, AAMAS 2021 (Full Paper), 2021. Gota Morishita*, Kenshi Abe*, Kazuhisa Ogawa, Yusuke Kaneko: “Online Learning for Bidding Agent in First Price Auction”, AAAI 2020 Workshop on Reinforcement Learning in Games, 2020.
